TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The aunts, uncles, grandparents, grandchildren, nieces, nephews, or half-siblings of an individual. Also called second-degree relative.
An aunt, uncle, grandparent, grandchild, niece, nephew, or half-brother or -sister. Also called second-degree relative.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tía, tío, abuelo, nieto, sobrina, sobrino, o hermanastro o hermanastra. También se llama pariente de segundo grado.
